title: Dogs with the most Instagram followers worldwide 2017
summary: This bar chart has 10 categories for the x axis representing Month, and a y axis representing Number of followers in millions.
The highest category is found at Jiff_Pom_@Jiffpom where Number of followers in millions is 6.6.
The lowest category is found at Manny_@manny_the_frenchie where Number of followers in millions is 1.0.
gold: This statistic presents a ranking of the most popular dogs on Instagram as of October 2017 , sorted by the highest numbers of followers . Pomeranian Jiff Pom was the most-followed dog on the photo sharing app platform with 6.6 million followers .
